message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $120. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
